Description: Nightly batch job failed - member dividend calculation
Resolution Notes: Memory overflow in calculation loop. Added pagination to process members in chunks of 1000.

Description: Core API timeout on loan origination
Resolution Notes: API response time exceeds 30s for complex loan products. Fiserv investigating server performance.

Description: Member photo sync failure from imaging system
Resolution Notes: Incorrect file path in sync script. Updated to use UNC path instead of mapped drive.

Description: Daily overdraft report email not sending
Resolution Notes: SMTP authentication expired. Updated credentials in config file.
Transactions from ATM ID 4521 posting 2+ hours late. Checking network connectivity and ISO8583 message queue.
Output file contains invalid characters causing bank rejection. Fiserv patching file encoding logic.
Session token expiration too aggressive. Extended from 15min to 30min.
Timezone configuration error. Corrected to Pacific Time in system settings.
New return code R85 not recognized. Added to ACH return code lookup table.
5 member accounts showing incorrect balances on monthly statements. Investigating GL posting sequence.

Description: Credit card fraud detection system offline
Resolution Notes: Database connection pool exhausted. Increased max connections from 50 to 100.
Cron job disabled during maintenance and not re-enabled. Reactivated and backfilled missed notices.
NADA vehicle value XML format changed. Fiserv updating parser for new schema.

Description: Online banking dashboard charts not loading
Resolution Notes: JavaScript library CDN outage. Switched to local hosting of Chart.js library.
Printer driver update changed margin defaults. Adjusted print template margins by 0.25in.

Description: Core system slow response during peak hours
Resolution Notes: Query response times spike 10x between 9-11am. Running SQL profiler to identify bottlenecks.
Email queue processing script hung. Added timeout and retry logic.
Extra payments incorrectly applying to future due dates instead of principal. Fiserv investigating payment allocation logic.

Description: Board report footer missing page numbers
Resolution Notes: Report template variable incorrectly named. Changed {PAGE_NUM} to {PAGE_NUMBER}.
Experian API calls timing out intermittently. Checking firewall rules and API rate limits.
